messages.content:
Answer the given question. You must conduct reasoning inside <think> and </think> first every time you get new information. After reasoning, if you find you lack some knowledge, you can call a search engine by <search> query </search> and it will return the top searched results between <information> and </information>. You can search as many times as your want. If you find no further external knowledge needed, you can directly provide the answer inside <answer> and </answer>, without detailed illustrations. For example, <answer> Beijing </answer>. Question: Please organize a table showing the champion teams of each of the European top five football leagues of 5 seasons from the 2020–21 season to the 2024–25 season, along with the Player of the Season (based on Sofascore ratings) for each season. For each player, include their club at the time and their rating score (keep two digits after the decimal point).

Please present the organized data in a single Markdown table format, do not leave empty cells.
The column headers should be:
League, Season, Champion Club, MVP Player, Club, Rating.

Don't ask me any questions, just output the results according to the columns without omitting cells arbitrarily. The output format is ```markdown
{data_content}
```.?

To organize this data, I need to gather information about the champions of the top five European football leagues over the specified seasons, along with the Player of the Season based on Sofascore ratings. I will start by finding out which clubs won the league championships during these years.

<search>European top five football leagues champions 2020-21 to 2024-25</search>

Search query: European top five football leagues champions 2020-21 to 2024-25
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.uefa.com/nationalassociations/uefarankings/country/):
Country coefficients | UEFA rankings UEFA Conference League ; UEFA Champions League ; UEFA Futsal EURO ; UEFA Europa League ; UEFA Women's Champions League.

[Doc 2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Big_Five_(association_football)):
Big Five (association football) - Wikipedia Record champions in the Big Five · 20 – Manchester United · 20 – Liverpool · 13 – Arsenal · 10 – Manchester City · 09 – Everton · 07 – Aston Villa · 06 – Chelsea · 06 – ...

[Doc 3](https://www.topendsports.com/sport/soccer/list-league-winners.htm):
Football League Winners Lists - Topend Sports England - English Premier League (EPL) · Spain - La Liga Primera Division · Portugal - Primeira Liga · Italy - Serie A · France - Ligue 1 · Germany - Bundesliga ...

Based on the available data:

<search>Player of the Season Sofascore Ratings 2020-21 to 2024-25</search>

Search query: Player of the Season Sofascore Ratings 2020-21 to 2024-25
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.sofascore.com/news/sofascore-player-of-the-season-2024-25-full-list-of-winners/):
Sofascore Player of the Season 2024/25: Full List of Winners Based on our trusted Sofascore Rating and detailed match-by-match stats, these are the top-rated players who led their leagues with consistent excellence.

[Doc 2](https://www.reddit.com/r/NorskFotball/comments/1prlhs4/sofascore_highest_rated_players_in_each_of_the/):
[Sofascore] Highest rated players in each of the top 5 leagues so far ... -7 md. [Sofascore] Joshua Kimmich is Sofascore's highest-rated player of the top five leagues in 2024/25.

[Doc 3](https://www.sofascore.com/news/sofascore-player-of-the-season-2024-25-full-winter-league-winners/):
Sofascore Player of the Season 2025: Full Winter League Winners Meet the Sofascore Player of the Season winners from leagues that ended this winter, featuring top ratings, big names, and rising stars.

Based on these findings:

<search>English Premier League Champions 2020-21 to 2024-25</search>

Search query: English Premier League Champions 2020-21 to 2024-25
Result: [Doc 1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_English_football_champions):
List of English football champions - Wikipedia Current champions. Liverpool (20th title) (2024–25). Most successful club(s). Liverpool · Manchester United (20 titles each). The new league's inaugural season ...

[Doc 2](https://www.marca.com/en/football/premier-league/winners.html):
Premier League Winners List - EPL winners from 1888 to 2026 Winner, Runners-up. 2024-25, Liverpool, Arsenal. 2023-24, Manchester City, Arsenal. 2022-23, Manchester City, Arsenal. 2021-22, Manchester City, Liverpool. 2020 ...

[Doc 3](https://www.foxsports.com/stories/soccer/premier-league-winners-complete-list-of-champions-by-year):
Premier League Winners: Complete list of champions by year Manchester United (20) · Liverpool (20) · Arsenal (13) · Manchester City (10) · Everton (9) · Aston Villa (7) · Chelsea (6) · Sunderland (6) ...
